title: No Year of the Goat Icon Please Help Me rito pls
body: I Just Gifted My Friend 5 MIns Ago so i could get the icon but i dont have it so can somebody please help me

replies.body: How strange. The Lunar Revel has not ended yet. If you are 100% sure you haven't gotten the icons, get a screenshot of evidence that you purchased the gift on the right date. Make a support ticket to Riot support and explain the situation.
Okay i have done that now so do i just wait for a reply?
Yes. They usually take around a day to get back to you.
